title: Hedgehog Lab Foundations
summary_markdown:
Build your foundation for hands-on learning in the Hedgehog Virtual Lab! This course covers accessing your cloud-based learning environment across all three major cloud providers.

You'll learn how to connect to the Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) on Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, and Microsoft Azure. By the end of this course, you'll be comfortable accessing your hands-on learning environment from any of these platforms.

content_blocks.title: Welcome to Hedgehog Lab Foundations
content_blocks.body_markdown: This course provides everything you need to access the Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) for hands-on learning. Choose the module for your preferred cloud provider below.

content_blocks.title: Access Your Virtual Lab
content_blocks.body_markdown: The Hedgehog Virtual Lab (VLAB) is your dedicated cloud environment. Choose one of the following modules based on your preferred cloud provider to learn how to access your VLAB.

content_blocks.title: Next Steps
content_blocks.body_markdown: Congratulations on completing Hedgehog Lab Foundations! You now have access to your VLAB and are ready to explore learning pathways. Check the pathways page to continue your learning journey!
